name: Splashy Tiles
description:
Swipe your fingers to control the ball with the most challenging music game - Splashy Tiles: Bouncing to the Beat.

Try not to fall off the edge

Finish the song to unlock more attractive EDM and Trap songs

How far can you bounce to the beat?

Privacy Policy: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rNzWkYa68rTIeM2KGucX2Xgd41R1miU_kvIlPKbWSAs
